text:
AutoFi.com | Senior Software Engineers | San Francisco, CA | Onsite | Full-time

keith@autofi.com

AutoFi is a San Francisco-based startup working on making and getting auto loans easier (https://www.autofi.com/about-us.html).

We are opening engineering positions for 5 Senior SWEs who love Javascript and can show it. (https://jobs.lever.co/autofi/b153c921-2d00-4ef0-89b1-746df39...)

Our stack: JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB, Redis, Docker in an agile-development environment.

Please feel free to email me directly with any question about what we are building.
